quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"gold"(黄金)或"golf"(高尔夫)联想，或因"Golgi"为人名而误判为实验室设备，而非细胞细胞器
quiz_item.sentence: In both plant and animal cells, the **Golgi apparatus** modifies proteins and sends them to where they are needed within the cell.
